fh-1.1: During your attack ability, gain advantage on one attack.

fh-2.1: When you are attacked, treat any %game.attackmodifier.double% attack modifier card the enemy draws as a %game.attackmodifier.plus1% instead.

fh-3.1: At the start of the scenario increase your maximum hit point value by 1.

fh-4.1: On the next two attacks targeting you, the attacker gains disadvantage.

fh-6.1: During your end-of-turn looting, loot an adjacent hex instead of the hex you occupy.

fh-7.1: During your turn, add +1 %game.action.range% to one of your ranged attacks.

fh-8.1: During your turn, one of your single-target melee attack abilities may target an enemy two hexes away.

fh-9.1: During you turn, grant one ally within %game.action.range:2%:

fh-10.1: When an enemy would apply a negative condition to you, prevent the condition

fh-11.1: At the start of the scenario remove one %game.attackmodifier.minus1% modifier card from your attack modifier deck.

fh-12.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:2% for the attack.

fh-13.1: After you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, perform:

fh-14.1: During your melee attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% to one attack.

fh-15.1: When an enemy would apply a negative condition to you, prevent the condition.

fh-16.1: During your turn, grant all adjacent allies: %game.action.move% 2

fh-17.1: On the next two attacks targeting you, the attacker gains disadvantage.

fh-18.1: During your turn add +1 %game.action.move% to all your move abilities.

fh-19.1: During your attack ability add %game.condition.muddle% all your attacks.

fh-20.1: During your turn, add +1 %game.action.range% to all your ranged attacks.

fh-21.1: While you are adjacent to three or more enemies, gain %game.action.shield:1%.

fh-22.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:3% for the attack.

fh-23.1: At the start of your turn, add -2 %game.action.move% to all your move abilities to gain %game.action.shield% this round.

fh-24.1: During your melee attack ability, add %game.condition.wound%, %game.condition.poison%, and %game.condition.muddle% to one attack.

fh-26.1: During your attack ability, treat all negative and %game.attackmodifier.null% modifier cards as %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.

fh-27.1: Immediately after an enemy ends its move ability adjacent to you, perform %game.action.push% %game.action.target% the enemy

fh-28.1: During your turn add +1 %game.action.move% to all your move abilities and ignore difficult terrain.

fh-29.1: After your melee attack, one enemy adjacent to the target suffers %game.damage% 2.

fh-30.1: Immediately after an enemy ends its move ability adjacent to you, perform %game.action.attack% 3 %game.action.target% the enemy

fh-31.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from any source, negate the %game.damage%.

fh-33.1: Up to once each turn during your move ability, add +1 %game.action.move%, then flip this card over at the end of your turn.
fh-33.2: Up to once each turn during your move ability, suffer %game.damage:1%, then flip this card over at the end of your turn.

fh-34.1: After your ranged attack, all enemies adjacent to the target suffer %game.damage% 2.

fh-35.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attack and prevent any negative conditions from the attack.

fh-36.1: When you are attacked by an attack with disadvantage, treat all %game.attackmodifier.plus0% and %game.attackmodifier.plus1% attack modifier cards as %game.attackmodifier.minus1%.

fh-37.1: During your turn suffer %game.damage% 3 to perform $invisible$ self

fh-38.1: During your turn, perform: %game.action.move% 2 This movement must end adjacent to an enemy.

fh-39.1: During your attack ability, add +3 %game.action.attack% and %game.action.pierce% to one attack targeting a Frozen Corpse, Ice Wraith, or Living Doom.

fh-40.1: During your turn, add +1 %game.action.attack% and +2 %game.action.range% to one of your ranged attacks.

fh-41.1: At the start of the scenario remove one %game.attackmodifier.plus0% and one %game.attackmodifier.minus1% modifier card from your attack modifier deck.

fh-42.1: On the next two sources of %game.damage% from attacks targeting you gain %game.action.shield:2% for the attacks.

fh-43.1: During your melee attack ability, add %game.action.push% to one attack.

fh-46.1: During your attack ability, gain advantage on all attacks and treat all %game.attackmodifier.plus0% and %game.attackmodifier.minus1% modifier cards as %game.attackmodifier.plus1% instead.

fh-47.1: On the next two sources of %game.damage% from attacks targeting you, suffer %game.damage% 3 to give the attacker %game.condition.brittle%.

fh-48.1: After an ally's heal ability targeting you, perform:

fh-49.1: During your melee attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.wound% one attack.

fh-50.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attack and flip this card over.
fh-50.2: During your melee attack ability, add %game.action.pierce% 1 to one attack and flip this card over.

fh-52.1: During your turn, %game.element.consume.fire% to cause up to two enemies within %game.action.range:4% to suffer %game.damage% 1.

fh-53.1: After you move 4 or more hexes during your turn, gain %game.action,retaliate% 1 for the round.

fh-54.1: During your short rest, instead of randomly losing one card from your discard pile, randomly draw three cards from your discard pile and choose one to lose.

fh-55.1: When you are attacked by an adjacent enemy, gain %game.action,retaliate% 2 for the attack.

fh-56.1: During your turn, %game.element.consume.earth% to loot one adjacent loot token.

fh-57.1: During your turn, destroy one adjacent obstacle, hazardous terrain, difficult terrain, icy terrain, or trap tile.

fh-58.1: During your melee attack ability, add +2 %game.action.attack% to one attack. After the ability, gain %game.condition.disarm%.

fh-59.1: At the start of the scenario, for the scenario, gain one 1-mark perk from your character sheet which you have not yet gained.

fh-60.1: At the start of the scenario, bring up to two additional %game.items.slots.small% items.

fh-61.1: Immediately after you are attacked by an adjacent enemy, that enemy suffers %game.damage% X, where is X is your %game.action.shield% value for the attack.

fh-62.1: During your move ability, add +1 %game.action.move% and gain %game.condition.regenerate%

fh-64.1: When one of your summons is killed, all enemies adjacent to it suffer %game.damage% 2 and gain %game.condition.wound%.

fh-65.1: During your turn, place a character token on one normal or elite enemy within %game.action.range:3%.  That enemy gains -1 %game.action.shield% for the scenario.

fh-66.1: At the start of your rest, perform:

fh-67.1: When you are attacked, add +1 %game.action.attack% to attack to instead of drawing an attack modifier card and flip this card over.
fh-67.2: During you attack ability add +1 %game.action.attack% to one attack instead of drawing an attack modifier card and flip this card over.

fh-68.1: On the next three sources of 2 or fewer %game.damage% you would suffer, negate the %game.damage%.

fh-69.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, %game.element.consume.air% to gain %game.action.shield:3% for the attack.

fh-70.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from %game.action.retaliate%, reduce the %game.damage% to 1. If it already 1, reduce it to 0 instead.

fh-71.1: After your ability where you kill an enemy, perform:

fh-73.1: When you apply a positive condition to an ally, a different ally within %game.action.range:3% gains the same condition.

fh-75.1: After any ally within %game.action.range:2% suffers %game.damage% from an attack, remove all negative conditions from the ally then perform:

fh-76.1: During one of your summons' turns, decide how it performs it's abilities.

fh-77.1: During you turn, replace one 1-hex obstacle, hazardous terrain, difficult terrain, or icy terrain tile in an unoccupied hex withing %game.action.range:2% with a different type of tile listed above.

fh-78.1: Once each turn, during your attack ability, gain advantage on one attack, then flip this card over at the end of your turn.
fh-78.2: Once each turn, during your attack ability, gain disadvantage on one attack, then flip this card over at the end of your turn.

fh-79.1: During you turn, add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks and perform:

fh-80.1: When you would suffer 4 or fewer %game.damage% from attack, negate the %game.damage% and perform %game.action.heal% X self where x is the amount of damage you would have suffered.

fh-81.1: When you suffer 5 or fewer %game.damage% from an attack, one enemy within %game.action.range:2% also suffers the same amount of %game.damage%.

fh-82.1: During your move ability, after you enter any one hex, give %game.condition.immobilize% all adjacent enemies.

fh-84.1: During your turn, %game.card.recover% one level 1 card from your discard pile.

fh-85.1: During your turn, add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks.

fh-87.1: During your turn, remove one negative condition you have.  This item can be used while you have %game.condition.impair% %game.condition.stun%.

fh-93.1: When you reveal a %game.attackmodifier.null% attack modifier card from your attack modifier deck, treat it as a %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.

fh-97.1: During your turn, one enemy withing %game.action.range:2% suffers %game.damage% 2.

fh-100.1: During your turn, %game.card.recover% one card from your discard pile.

fh-101.1: During your turn, add +2 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks.

fh-103.1: During your turn, remove all negative conditions you have.  This item can be used while you have %game.condition.impair% %game.condition.stun%.

fh-104.1: During your move ability, add +3 %game.action.move% and %game.action.jump%.

fh-106.1: During your turn, perform %game.condition.ward% %game.action.target% 2 adjacent allies and self

fh-107.1: During your turn, perform %game.condition.strengthen% %game.action.target% 2 adjacent allies and self

fh-108.1: During your turn, perform %game.condition.bless% %game.action.target% 2 adjacent allies and self

fh-109.1: During your turn, %game.card.recover% up to one of your lost 2-herb potions.

fh-110.1: When you reveal a %game.attackmodifier.null% attack modifier card from your attack modifier deck, treat it as a %game.attackmodifier.plus2% instead.

fh-113.1: At the start of your turn, discard one of your played cards to perform both the top and bottom actions of your other played card. At most one action can trigger a %game.card.lost% icon.

fh-114.1: During your turn, reveal the top card of one monster ability deck. You may place the card on the bottom of the deck.

fh-115.1: During your turn, ignore one elemental consumption symbol on an action you played and gain its effect.

fh-118.1: During your turn, one enemy within %game.action.range:2% suffers %game.damage% 4.

fh-123.1: When you are attacked, before drawing an attack modifier car, the attacker gains disadvantage on the attack.

fh-124.1: During your turn, add %game.action.jump% to all your move abilities.

fh-126.1: During your ranged attack ability, add %game.condition.immobilize% one attack.

fh-127.1: During your melee attack ability, add %game.condition.poison% one attack.

fh-128.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attack.

fh-129.1: During your attack ability, gain advantage on all attacks.

fh-130.1: When you are attacked, treat any %game.attackmodifier.double% attack modifier card the enemy draws as a %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.

fh-131.1: On the next three sources of %game.damage% from attacks targeting you, you gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attacks.

fh-132.1: At the start of the scenario, bring one additional %game.items.slots.small% items.

fh-133.1: When an adjacent ally would be targeted by an attack, you are targeted instead, regardless of range and line-of-sight.

fh-134.1: When you use the basic bottom action of an ability card, perform %game.action.move% 3 instead of %game.action.move% 2.

fh-135.1: During your attack, add %game.action.pierce% to all your ranged attacks.

fh-136.1: During your single-target melee attack ability, change the targeting of the ability to:

fh-137.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:2% for the attack.

fh-138.1: When an enemy would give you %game.condition.disarm%, %game.condition.stun%, or %game.condition.muddle%, prevent the condition.

fh-139.1: After your move 4 or more hexes on your turn, add +1 %game.action.attack% to your next melee attack this turn.

fh-140.1: During your turn, grant one of your summons: %game.action.shield:2%.

fh-141.1: When you are attacked, before drawing an attack modifier card, the attacker gains disadvantage on the attack and you gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attack.

fh-142.1: During ordering of initiative after all ability card have been revealed, increase or decrease your initiative by 20.

fh-143.1: After you move 4 or more hexes during your turn, after the move ability perform:

fh-144.1: During your turn, %game.element.consume.wild% to add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks.

fh-146.1: During your attack, add %game.action.pull% to all your ranged attacks.

fh-148.1: After the next three attacks targeting an ally within %game.action.range:2%, flip this card over.

fh-149.1: On the next five sources of %game.damage% from attacks targeting you, you gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attacks.

fh-151.1: When you use the basic bottom action of an ability card, perform %game.action.move% 4 instead of %game.action.move% 2.

fh-152.1: At the end of your turn, if you have moved 1 or fewer hexes during your turn, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the round.

fh-154.1: During your single-target ranged attack ability, change the targeting of the ability to:

fh-160.1: When you short rest, %game.card.recover% up to three of your spent items, and perform:

fh-163.1: During your turn, give %game.condition.stun% to half (rounded up) the enemies adjacent to you.

fh-164.1: When you short rest, %game.card.recover% up to three of your spent items, choose which card to lose during the rest, and perform:

fh-165.1: At the end of you turn, play one card from your hand and perform the bottom action of the card.

fh-167.1: At the start of the enemy's turn, before it determines its focus, perform:

fh-168.1: During your ranged attack ability, add +1 %game.action.target%.

fh-169.1: During your turn, reveal the top card of your attack modifier deck. You may place the card on the bottom of the deck.

fh-170.1: During your turn, reveal the top card of each monster ability deck.

fh-171.1: Whenever you lose a card to negate %game.damage%, %game.card.recover% up to one card from your discard pile and gain %game.condition.regenerate%.

fh-172.1: During your turn, look at the top four cards of your attack modifier deck and put them back in any order.

fh-174.1: During your turn, perform: %game.action.teleport% 20 This teleport must end in a hex adjacent to one of your allies.

fh-175.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, the attacker suffers and equal amount of %game.damage%.

fh-176.1: During your turn, perform: %game.action.teleport% 4 This teleport must end in a hex adjacent to one of your enemies.

fh-177.1: When you spring a trap by entering its hex, you may apply its effects to a figure withing %game.action.range:3% instead of yourself.

fh-178.1: At the start of your turn in which your initiative is 60 or higher and you are not performing a long rest, perform %game.action.heal% 1 self.

fh-179.1: During your move ability, add +4 %game.action.move%.  After the move ability gain %game.condition.immobilize%.

fh-180.1: When you loot two or more tokens at once, perform: %game.condition.bless% self.

fh-181.1: During your turn, designate two allies or any two normal or elite monsters. Each designated figure simultaneously %game.action.teleport% to the hex occupied by the other designated figure.

fh-182.1: After your melee attack , place a character token on the target. The target loses %game.action.fly%.

fh-183.1: During your turn, all figures gain disadvantage on and add 1 %game.action.range% to all ranged attacks this round.

fh-184.1: During your multi-target melee attack ability, add +1 %game.action.target%.

fh-185.1: During your melee attack ability, add all negative conditions you have except %game.condition.brittle%, %game.condition.bane% %game.condition.stun% one attack.

fh-186.1: During your turn, create one 1-hex obstacle in an adjacent empty hex.

fh-187.1: During your turn, create one %game.damage% 3 trap in an adjacent empty hex.

fh-188.1: During your turn, create one 1-hex hazardous terrain, icy terrain, or water tile in an adjacent featureless hex.

fh-190.1: During your turn, place a character token on one normal or elite enemy withing %game.action.range:3%. This enemy adds -1 %game.action.attack% to all its attacks.

fh-192.1: At the end of your turn, designate one enemy withing %game.action.range:3%. You are its primary focus and it does not avoid negative hexes when determining movement this round.

fh-193.1: During your turn, control one enemy withing %game.action.range:3%:

fh-194.1: During ordering of initiative after all ability card have been revealed, increase or decrease a monster set's initiative by 30.

fh-195.1: During your turn add +1 %game.action.range% and %game.action.pierce% to one of your ranged attacks.

fh-196.1: During your turn, discard one loot card except Random Item to perform:

fh-197.1: After ordering of initiative, exchange a card in your hand for one which you have played. Your initiative is unaffected.

fh-199.1: At the start of the scenario, consider yourself to be your summons in initiative order when determining monster focus for the remainder of the scenario.

fh-200.1: During your heal ability targeting an ally, %game.element.consume.light% to add %game.condition.regenerate% one heal and flip this card over.
fh-200.2: During your attack ability, %game.element.consume.dark% to add %game.condition.curse% to one attack and flip this card over.

fh-201.1: During your attack ability performed while occupying or ad adjacent to a hex with a water tile, add %game.action.push% and %game.condition.immobilize% one attack.

fh-202.1: During your melee attack ability, add %game.action.pierce% and %game.condition.wound% one attack.

fh-203.1: After your ability control one target:

fh-204.1: During your turn, one adjacent normal or elite enemy suffers %game.damage% to their %game.action.shield% value.

fh-206.1: During your melee attack ability, if you have not move this round, add +2 %game.action.attack% to one attack, and you may perform no move abilities this turn.

fh-207.1: After your attack, if the target's current hit point is 3 or less, give the target %game.condition.bane%

fh-208.1: During your attack ability add %game.action.pierce% to one attack targeting an enemy whose current hit point value is 4 or less.

fh-209.1: During your melee attack ability, give advantage on one attack.  For each master you have completed also add one following to the attack: +1 %game.action.attack%, %game.condition.wound%, or %game.condition.poison%.

fh-210.1: During your turn, add +3 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks performed by Lurkers targeting you this round.

fh-211.1: During your turn, designate one adjacent hex.  At the end of your turn, all figures withing %game.action.range:2% of the designated hex suffer %game.damage% 1.

fh-212.1: After ordering of initiative, choose one element. This element cannot be infused or consume by any monster this round.

fh-213.1: During your attack ability %game.element.consume.ice% to add %game.condition.immobilize% one attack, then flip this card over at the end of your turn.
fh-213.2: During your attack ability, %game.element.consume.fire% to add %game.condition.wound% to one attack and flip this card over.

fh-214.1: During your heal ability add one positive condition you have to one heal.

fh-215.1: During your, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.muddle% to all your attacks. At the end of your turn, perform:

fh-216.3: Elements do not move from strong to waning at the end of this round.

fh-217.1: During ordering of initiative after all ability card have been revealed, shuffle all monster ability decks and draw a new card for each active monster set.

fh-218.1: During your turn, remove all conditions from all figures then grant all figures:

fh-219.1: During your turn all figures gain %game.condition.strengthen%. Until any monster is killed, the first attack modifier card drawn for every attack is treated as rolling.

fh-220.1: During your turn, %game.card.recover% up to one Tome item.

fh-221.1: During your melee attack ability, %game.element.consume.ice% to add %game.action.pierce% to one attack.

fh-222.1: During yor turn, discard two cards from your hand to perform:

fh-223.1: After ordering of initiative, all monsters consider you to be first in initiative order when determining focus this round.

fh-224.1: After the next three attacks targeting you, flip this card over.

fh-225.1: During your melee attack ability, %game.element.consume.earth% to add +1 %game.action.attack% to one attack and flip this card over.
fh-225.2: During your ranged attack ability, %game.element.consume.air% to add %game.action.push% 2 to one attack and flip this card over.

fh-226.1: During your attack ability, double the numerical value of the next attack modifier card you draw. %game.attackmodifier.double% and %game.attackmodifier.null% modifier cards are unaffected.

fh-227.1: When you short rest, place half (rounded down) of your discard pile on this item, lose of the remaining cards randomly as normal, then draw the cards on this item.

fh-228.1: During your turn, open one unlocked door while withing %game.action.range:2%.

fh-229.1: During your turn grant one ally withing %game.action.range:3%:

fh-230.1: After you draw one loot card, draw one additional card, keep one, and place the other on either the top or bottom of the loot deck.

fh-231.1: When you gain a loot token, gain 3 `hide` instead of drawing a loot card.

fh-232.1: During your turn lose 1 morale to perform:

fh-233.1: During an ally's ranged attack ability, add %game.condition.muddle% and %game.condition.curse% one attack.

fh-234.1: During your turn, create one %game.condition.poison%, %game.condition.immobilize% in an empty hex within %game.action.range:2%.

fh-235.1: During your turn, loot one loot token within %game.action.range:2%.

fh-236.1: During your turn, lose one card from your hand to %game.card.recover% one card from your loot pile of equal of lower level.

fh-237.1: During your turn, choose one of six directions. You and all figures withing %game.action.range:2% are forced to simultaneously move 2 hexes in the chosen direction.

fh-238.1: When you would become exhausted from suffering %game.damage%, set your hit point value to 1 instead.

fh-239.1: During your turn, all allies and enemies within %game.action.range:2% suffer %game.damage% 1.

fh-240.1: When you fail a scenario, still earn all %game.checkmark% from your battle goal if it was completed.

fh-241.1: After you draw one loot card, draw one additional loot card.

fh-242.1: During your attack ability, treat the next three attack modifier cards you draw as rolling

fh-243.1: This item cannot be sold and must be brought into and used every scenario.
fh-243.2: At the start of the scenario perform:

fh-244.1: During your turn, increase the printed %game.action.attack%, %game.action.move%, %game.action.target%, or %game.action.range% numerical value on one of your abilities by 1.

fh-247.1: During your turn, capture an adjacent enemy whose hit point value is 1 or 2.

fh.12: You find the remains of Camilla and her paintings of a majestic horned creature.
fh.54: Treasure chest? There was no treasure chest there Maybe you should slow down on the drink
fh.57: What’s this? An empty chest with a lead trapdoor at the bottom You make note of the location so you can return with Gem’s help later.
fh.62: gain Mechanical Cube blueprint %game.itemFh.82% when you find the other half of this blueprint.

astral.1: Move one waning element to strong
astral.3: Whenever you become exhausted, keep all your active bonuses in play, with your summons acting on initiative 99 each round
astral.4: Whenever you short rest, you may %game.element.consume.wild% to %game.card.recover% on spent %game.items.slots.onehand% or %game.items.slots.twohand% item
astral.5: Once each scenario, during ordering of initiative, after all ability cards have been revealed, %game.element.wild%
astral.7: Kill at least four enemies, but never attack

coral.1: If you performed a %data.action.custom.fh-tides% action this round, %game.attackmodifier.plus2% instead
coral.2: %game.custom.perks.ignoreNegativeItemFh% and, whenever you would gain %game.condition.impair%, prevent the condition
coral.3: Whenever you declare a long rest during card selection, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the round
coral.4: Gain advantage on all your attacks performed while occupying or targeting enemies occupying water hexes
coral.5: Never suffer damage from attacks, and be targeted by at least five attacks
coral.6: At the start of each of your rests, have more active %game.action.custom.fh-tides% than cards in your discard pile

drill.2: The target and all enemies adjacent to it suffer %game.damage:1%
drill.3: Whenever you long rest, you may %game.action.custom.fh-pressure-up% or %game.action.custom.fh-pressure-down%
drill.4: Whenever you would gain %game.condition.poison%, you may suffer %game.damage:1% to prevent the condition
drill.5: Once each scenario, when you would become exhausted, instead gain %game.condition.stun% and %game.condition.invisible%, lose all your cards, %game.card.recover% four lost cards, and then discard the recovered cards
drill.7: For four consecutive rounds, move the pressure gauge up or down three levels from where is started the round (%game.action.custom.fh-pressure-low% to %game.action.custom.fh-pressure-over%, or vice versa)

fist.1: Create one 1-hex icy terrain tile in a featureless hex adjacent to the target
fist.2: %game.custom.perks.ignoreNegativeItemFh%, and whenever you enter icy terrain with a move ability, you may ignore the effect to add +1 %game.action.move%
fist.3: Whenever you heal from a long rest, you may %game.elementHalf.consume:ice|earth% to add +2 %game.action.heal%
fist.4: Once each scenario, when you would suffer %game.damage%, you may negate the %game.damage%
fist.5: %game.card.recover% at least one card from your discard pile each round
fist.6: Enter at least ten different hexes with one move ability, then cause one enemy to suffer at least %game.damage:10% with one attack ability in the same turn

kelp.3: Whenever you long rest, you may %game.action.loot% one adjacent hex. If you gain any loot tokens, gain 1 %game.action.custom.fh-trophy%
kelp.4: At the start of each scenario gain 2 %game.action.custom.fh-trophy%
kelp.5: While you have %game.condition.invisible%, gain advantage on all your attacks
kelp.6: Perform all your attacks with advantage

meteor.1: Create one 1-hex hazardous terrain tile in a featureless hex adjacent to the target
meteor.2: Whenever you long rest, you may destroy one adjacent obstacle to gain %game.condition.ward%
meteor.3: Whenever you short rest, you may %game.element.consume.fire% to perform %game.condition.wound%, %game.action.target:1% enemy occupying or adjacent to hazardous terrain
meteor.4: You and all allies are unaffected by hazardous terrain you create
meteor.5: Create or destroy at least one obstacle or hazardous terrain tile each round
meteor.6: Move enemies through six different hexes of hazardous terrain you created in one turn

prism.1: At the end of turn perform:
prism.2: Focus on the enemy farthest from HIVE.
prism.4: When attacked reduece %game.damage% by 1 for each negative condition the attacker has.
prism.5: Give %game.condition.wound% to all adjacent figures and self at the end of turn.
prism.6: After this attack ability, grant one of your summons %game.action.move:2% card
prism.8: Whenever you long rest, you may do so on any initiative value, choosing your initiative after all ability cards have been revealed, and you decide how your summons perform their abilities for the round
prism.9: At the end of each of your short rests, you may %game.action.custom.fh-mode%
prism.10: Whenever you would gain %game.condition.wound%, prevent the condition
prism.12: %game.action.custom.fh-mode% into four different summons in one round

shackles.3: Add +1 %game.action.attack% for each negative condition you have
shackles.4:
Each round in which you long rest, you may ignore all negative conditions you have.
If you do, they cannot be removed that round
shackles.5: Whenever you become exhausted, first perform %game.condition.curse%, %game.action.target% all, %game.action.range:3%
shackles.6: Increase your maximum hit point value by 5
shackles.7: Cause other figures to suffer a total of at least %game.damage:40% in one round

shards.1: Reveal the top card of the target's monster ability deck
shards.4: Whenever you short rest, you may %game.element.consume.air% to perform %game.condition.strengthen%, %game.action.range:3% and %game.element.consume.light% to perform %game.condition.bless%, %game.action.range:3%
shards.5: At the start of each scenario you may gain %game.condition.brittle% to gain 2 %game.action.custom.fh-resonance%
shards.6: Whenever a new room is revealed, you may reveal the top card of both the monster attack modifier deck and all allies' attack modifier decks
shards.7: Always have 0 %game.action.custom.fh-resonance% directly before you gain %game.action.custom.fh-resonance% at the end of each of your turns
shards.8: Spend 5 %game.action.custom.fh-resonance% on each of five different Wave abilities

snowflake.1: If this action forces the target to move, it suffers %game.damage:1%
snowflake.2: Whenever you long rest, you may %game.elementHalf:ice|air%
snowflake.3: Whenever you short rest, you may %game.element.consume.ice% to perform %game.condition.regenerate%, %game.action.range:3% and %game.element.consume.air% to perform %game.condition.ward%, %game.action.range:3%
snowflake.4: At the start of each scenario, all enemies gain %game.condition.muddle%. Whenever a new room is revealed, all enemies in the newly revealed room gain %game.condition.muddle%
snowflake.5: Cause at least one ally or enemy to move each round
snowflake.6: Ensure the first ally to suffer %game.damage% each round, directly before suffering the %game.damage%, has at least one condition you applied

trap.1: Create one %game.damage:2% trap in an adjacent empty hex at end of turn.
trap.2: Create one %game.action.heal% 2 trap in an empty hex adjacent to the target
trap.3: Create one %game.damage:1% trap in an empty hex adjacent to the target
trap.4: Add %game.damage:2% or %game.action.heal% 2 to a trap within %game.action.range:2% of you
trap.6: Whenever you long rest, you may create one %game.damage:1% trap in an adjacent empty hex
trap.7: Whenever you enter a hex with a trap, you may choose to not spring the trap
trap.8: At the start of each scenario, you may create one %game.damage:2% trap in an adjacent empty hex
trap.9: Have one %game.action.heal% trap on the map with a value of at least 20
trap.10: Move enemies through seven or more traps with one ability
